name: aether_revolt_maxi
description: A huge, comprehensive package capturing Aether Revolt–era mechanics: Improvise, Revolt, Energy, Vehicles (Crew), Thopters/Servos, artifact synergies, and fabricate-like patterns (without copying any card text).

Instant: {REVOLT_INTRO} Exile target tapped creature.
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. {E_MAY_SPEND}
Tap up to two target creatures. They don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
Create two 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.
Return target artifact or enchantment to its owner's hand.
Target attacking or blocking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it's an artifact creature, it gains first strike until end of turn.
Exile target artifact or enchantment. Its controller creates a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. If you controlled an artifact as you cast this spell, scry 1.
{REVOLT_INTRO} Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token for each creature that left the battlefield under your control this turn.
{REVOLT_INTRO} Exile target artifact or enchantment.
Sorcery: {REVOLT_INTRO} Destroy all creatures with power 4 or greater.
Create three 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.
Return target creature card with mana value {MVm1} or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
Exile target artifact. You gain 3 life.
Search your library for an Aura or Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Put a +1/+1 counter on up to two target creatures. Artifact creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.
{IMPROVISE_LINE} Draw two cards, then discard a card.
Enchantment: Creatures you control get +1/+1 as long as you control three or more artifacts.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.
Whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield, scry 1.
Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life and creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.
At the beginning of your end step, if you created a token this turn, {E_GAIN_SMALL}
Artifact: {IMPROVISE_LINE} {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If it's a token, it gains vigilance until end of turn.
When this enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

{E_PAY2}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

Vehicle — Crew 2.
Vehicle — Crew 3. Trample.

{T}: Target Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.

Vehicle — Crew 2. Whenever this becomes crewed, create a 1/1 Servo.
Vehicle — Crew 3. Whenever this becomes crewed, create a 1/1 Servo.
Vehicle — Crew 4. Whenever this becomes crewed, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

Enchant creature. When this Aura enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

TRIGGER_INTRO: Whenever you cast an artifact spell,
Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control,
Whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield,
REVOLT_INTRO: Revolt — If a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn,
Revolt — This spell has an additional effect if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn:
IMPROVISE_REMINDER: (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
CREW_HELPER: (Equipped creature can crew Vehicles as though its power were 2 greater.)
(Whenever equipped creature crews a Vehicle, that Vehicle gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
E_GAIN_BIG: You get {E}{E}{E}. Create a 1/1 Thopter with flying.
E_MAY_SPEND: (You may pay {E}. If you do, create a 1/1 Servo.)
(You may pay {E}{E}. If you do, scry 1.)
